abstract: Contrary to some reports, Google and News Corporation are not about to buy Bebo, a social networking site, for $1 billion to $1.5 billion, according to All Things Digital.
lead_paragraph: Contrary to some reports, Google and News Corporation are not about to buy Bebo, a social networking site, for $1 billion to $1.5 billion, according to All Things Digital.

headline.main: Bebo Said to Be Raising Fresh Capital
